welcomePage.aboutAppText: Managing resources, teams, deadlines or project budgets will be easy with all the professional Manage App features. With features for all project phases you can get your projects done from start-to-end smoothly.
welcomePage.registerText: * Register to use all the features applications.

aboutTeam.LenaInfo: Love cats, dogs and React class components
aboutTeam.AndreiInfo: Like to drink vodka with herring, but my wife forbids
aboutTeam.MarinaInfo: Like to cook borscht and fry meatballs. Hate layouts and node.js
